1.0.0.name: wordpress/reading-time
1.0.0.description:
Reading Time shows the estimated reading time of the post. The calculation is automatic; a custom value (in seconds) for a single post can be inserted using a Custom Field named "readingtime".

For more informations: http://www.whiletrue.it/en/projects/wordpress/17-reading-time-per-wordpress.html
